amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit the aggregate funding authorized in the bill to the amount appropriated in fiscal year 1997 resulting in a reduction of $265 million for both fiscal years 1998 and 1999.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the authorized spending levels in the bill for FY 1998 and FY 1999 to the amount appropriated in FY 1997 (a reduction of approximately $265 million).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanford amendment (A048) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 261 (Roll no. 179).
